mapper.sql: id, enterprise, area, kind, purchasedate, acceptor, extra, document, operator, operator_ip, operator_time
mapper.insert: insert into format_picture (id, enterprise, area, kind, purchasedate, acceptor, extra, document, operator, operator_ip, operator_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterprise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acceptor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into format_picture
id,
enterprise,
area,
kind,
purchasedate,
acceptor,
extra,
document,
operator,
operator_ip,
operator_time,

mapper.update:
update format_picture
enterprise = #{enterprise,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kind = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchasedate = #{purchasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
acceptor = #{acceptor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extra = #{extra,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document = #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update format_picture set enterprise = #{enterprise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kind = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchasedate = #{purchasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, acceptor = #{acceptor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra = #{extra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document = #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM (select a.*,b.enterprise_name as enterprise_name FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM format_picture as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise as b on a.enterprise = b.id) as a WHERE a.enterprise = #{id}

SELECT * FROM (select a.*,b.enterprise_name as enterprise_name FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM format_picture as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise as b on a.enterprise = b.id) as a WHERE a.enterprise = #{id}
order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
